attributes.action: introduce transparent sentencing,mandatory sentences for violent crimes and an extra category for murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Transparent sentences - what you get is what you serve. Mandatory sentences for violent crimes (carrying knives or guns 5 years, using weapons 10 yrs, attempted murder 20 years,)Introduce extra category for murder - Murder 1 - premeditated - life sentence no parole, Murder 2 - not planned but actual or implied intent to cause death or serious harm - minimum sentence 25 years. Manslaughter - for no intent or unforeseen circumstances - flexible sentence. Kicking someone to death would be Murder 2 not manslaughter.
The objective of this petition is to support Mrs Newlove's request for an effective deterrent
